name: Tanks Oil Driving Mission 3D
description:
Tanks Oil Driving Mission 3D is one of the best oil tanker truck games with an ultimate fun of oil delivery. So what are you waiting for fasten your seat belt, start your vehicle, accelerate your transporter truck and take it to its destination. Play this amazing 3D truck simulation game for free.

Features
- Powerful Tanker engine to carry heavy oil tank.
- Powerful hydraulic brakes to be safe at sharp twist and any other dangerous situations.
- Realistic Truck physics applied with smooth controls.
- Realistic damage and blast effects.
- Power steering controls
